## Source: ossf-package-analysis (041f06eacb4e8e5ffe66ccd96009305833355630bf63940b876d7c7f3ce7bd55)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified '@taxify/city-borders' @ 10.0.0 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
